H4BasicMod_releaseNotes:
1.Heroes
We added 11 Specialty Heroes, and 6 new Specialties:
1)Completed Block Specialty hero in all factions

New Specialties:
1)Normal Necromancy Specialty - Hero's Necromancy EXP + (Skill_Lv*100)+(10*Hero_Level), Double the conversion rate.

2)Special Necromancy Specialty 

3)Potion Specialty - Starting Spells:4 potion spells(Cold Resistance, Fire Resistance, Strength, Speed); 

4)Charm Specialty - Charm EXP +2.5% * Hero_Level
